TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定提供隐式键值的关联类的属性。

span.span: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the implicit key value.

summary.span: 对于 集合中的项，隐式键用于除 XAML 中定义的显式 属性以外的键。

span.span: Implicit keys are used for keys rather than explicit attributes defined in XAML for an item in collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项字典 (如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ) 需要密钥。Items in an dictionary (such as the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ) require a key. 在 XAML 中，键通常由指定`x:Key`中每个项的 XAML 标记中的属性。In XAML, the key is typically specified by `x:Key` attribute in the XAML markup for each item in the . 应用于类使用的隐式键，其中要用于密钥包含来自不同的属性值在类中。The is applied to classes that work with an implicit key, where the key to use for inclusion comes from a different property value in the class. 实例的类应用可以包含在而无需显式只要所引用的属性键有效作为该字典实现中的键的值。Instances of the class applying the can be included in an without an explicit key so long as the property referenced by has a value that is valid as a key in that dictionary implementation. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 以下列表引用的 WPF 应用此特性的位置的 Api 的示例所示：The following list references examples of WPF APIs where this attribute is applied: - - - 有关详细信息的资源字典意义的 WPF ，请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information about the WPF resource dictionary implications of , see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
